list-item.label: a)
list-item.p: The filler inlets of fuel tanks shall be easily accessible for filling.

list-item.label: b)
list-item.p: The filler inlets of fuel tanks shall be located outside the operator cab.

list-item.label: c)
list-item.p: The filling aperture shall be designed and positioned in such a way that any overflow or escape of fuel is prevented on any gradient for which the machine is designed.

list-item.label: d)
list-item.p: The filler inlets of fuel tanks shall have provisions for lockable filler caps.

list-item.label: e)
list-item.p: Fuel caps shall be secured to prevent unintended loosening in service and shall require an intentional action to release them. When released, they shall remain permanently attached to the machine in open position.
